Header: Fifth in the series of Ekata Sitimu in Moneragala ends on Saturday
Content: The fifth in the series of the Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme commenced is in progress in Moneragala. It will conclude on Saturday with the participation of the President. Many programmes are planned to be implemented within the Moneragala District jointly by the Presidential Secretariat and the Moneragala District Secretariat. The series of Rata Wenuwen Ekata Sitimu National Development programme is being implemented in the Moneragala District to sort out issues of the people of the District that have so far not been resolved. 101 programmes were launched covering 319 Grama Niladhari Divisions within the 11 Divisional Secretariat Divisions including Moneragala, Thanamalwila, Madulla, Kataragama and Buttala. The number of programmes mooted within the Uva Province is 37. A disease Prevention programme was held at the Moneragala Divisional Secretariat Division especially for the elder community. On the sidelines scholarships were awarded on behalf of school children. The distribution of water tanks and plants took place at the Wellawaya Divisional Secretariat. A drugs prevention programme and a walk were held at the Bibila Medagama National School with the participation of a large gathering.
